main event: On October 10, 1955, two triangular shaped objects were observed changing colors from red to green, seen through binoculars over Morengo, Illinois.
interesting points: The objects were observed at elevations of 170 and 35 degrees., The sighting lasted for two hours., The objects' colors changed from red to green., The sighting was reported by both civilians and military sources., The reporting officer concurred that the sighting was likely generated by a star or aircraft.
witness description: Civilian Harold Hyde, a machinist, and T/Sgt Bernard Thompson, a supervisor.
